Â«He was member of the Mihai Berindei Sextet,of the BucureÈ™ti Jazz Quartet
and has played with Aura Urziceanu, Pedro Negrescu,Eugen Gondi, Johnny  
RÄƒducanu, etc. He was a regular of Electrecord's Jazz Series.  Panoramic 
Jazz Rock was his debut album as soloist in 1977, and  is one rare example
of jazz rock from Romania during the 70's and later on Popp moved toward 
more contemporary traditional jazz composition. Source: wikipedia
